section.title: Description
section.para: A single line input field that lets selecting a number using controls near a text field. It's possible to change a value using "Up/Down" keyboard keys. The keyboard input in a field is possible if it isn't locked by the "manualInput" attribute. When arrow controls are pressed, the cursor can be moved in any way without losing a dragged state.

itemizedlist.listitem: Fully skinnable control and input elements
3D look and feel with an easily customizable appearance
Attribute-managed positions of the controls (inside/outside of the input field)
Optional disablement of the component on a page
Optional manual/controls-only input into a value text field
